comment: Texas Instruments PCM5100A — 2-ch 32-bit DAC, no I2C control. XSMT pin = hardware mute (active HIGH = play, LOW = mute) — managed by board hardware, not firmware registers. Volume is software-only via firmware mixer. Mute is handled via amp_enable pin (e.g. TPA3110 GPIO17 on Amped-ESP32-S3).
